title: Disney opts for Fifty Shades of Grey writer to pen live-action Cruella de Vil movie
text:
Disney opts for Fifty Shades of Grey writer to pen live-action Cruella de Vil movie 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Going from Fifty Shades of Grey to a Disney movie isn't an obvious career move, but it's what Kelly Marcel reportedly plans to do. The scree...
